content: GF#16970 proposed to add text about searching mime type - and said to consult Zulip. So comments on build.fhir.org/search.html#mimetype are welcome please
My comment also applies to Attachment.language and other places where languages are specified.
Contrary to the indicated resolution, I'm not sure that the value set is known.

Suggest including in the value set definition (http://build.fhir.org/valueset-mimetypes.html) that mimetypes may include parameters (charset, etc.) which are case-insensitive and have no standard order.
Hmm, interesting the link in the valueset definition to BCP 13 equates it to RFC 4289, but I found RFC 6838 claims to be BCP 13.
